person.persName: John D. Pollard (Frankfort, Kentucky, saddler, harness maker, and judge)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, saddler, harness maker, and judge. Pennsylvania native. Marries to Fannie E. Pollard. Saddler and harness maker in Frankfort from 1859 to 1865. Police judge at Frankfort in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 99; "Pollard v. Breckenridge," The Frankfort Roundabout (Frankfort, Ky.), August 19, 1893, p. 1.
